favourite.article: Praise the Lord for both your comments. I amen both of them. I especially enjoyed your dream brother Tery. What a precious answer from the Lord in the spirit of Joel 2:28.
This tune from "sound of music" was so lively and it goes well with these lyrics. This song is dear to my heart.
I asked the Lord for a new song, to replace some of the junk that was going in my head. Then this song came to me in a dream, and I was singing it to others - declaring to them the reality!
